message:
A good life does not mean just good food, good clothes, good shelter. 
These are not sufficient.
A good motivation is what is needed—compassion, without dogmatism, 
without complicated philosophy—just understanding
that others are human brothers and sisters and respecting
their rights and human dignity. ~ Dalai Lama
#Compassion
